problem_names:
lemma tauPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "\<tau>.(P) \<simeq> \<tau>.(Q)"

lemma outputPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "a{b}.P \<simeq> a{b}.Q"

lemma matchPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   b :: name

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "[a\<frown>b]P \<simeq> [a\<frown>b]Q"

lemma mismatchPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   b :: name

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "[a\<noteq>b]P \<simeq> [a\<noteq>b]Q"

lemma sumPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "P \<oplus> R \<simeq> Q \<oplus> R"

lemma parPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "P \<parallel> R \<simeq> Q \<parallel> R"

lemma resPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   x :: name

  assumes PeqQ: "P \<simeq> Q"
  
  shows "<\<nu>x>P \<simeq> <\<nu>x>Q"

lemma bangPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "!P \<simeq> !Q"
translations:
lemma tauPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "\<tau>.(P) \<simeq> \<tau>.(Q)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<approx> Q

proof (state)
this:
  P \<approx> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<tau>.P \<simeq> \<tau>.Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<approx> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<tau>.P \<simeq> \<tau>.Q
by(force intro: Weak_Early_Step_Sim_Pres.tauPres simp add: weakCongruence_def dest: weakBisimE(2))

lemma sumPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "P \<oplus> R \<simeq> Q \<oplus> R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<oplus> R \<simeq> Q \<oplus> R

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<oplus> R \<simeq> Q \<oplus> R
by(auto simp add: weakCongruence_def intro: Weak_Early_Step_Sim_Pres.sumPres Weak_Early_Bisim.reflexive)

lemma parPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "P \<parallel> R \<simeq> Q \<parallel> R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> R \<simeq> Q \<parallel> R

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> R \<simeq> Q \<parallel> R

have "\<And>P Q R. \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q; P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P \<parallel> R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q \<parallel> R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q R.
       \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q;
        P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<parallel>
                         R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q \<parallel>
    R

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q R.
       \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q;
        P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<parallel>
                         R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q \<parallel>
    R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q R.
       \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q;
        P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<parallel>
                         R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q \<parallel>
    R

proof (state)
this:
  P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q
  P \<approx> Q

goal (1 subgoal):

        P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk>

                         R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q \<parallel>

proof (prove)
using this:

  P \<approx> Q

goal (1 subgoal):

    R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q \<parallel> R

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q
  P \<approx> Q
  ?P \<approx> ?Q \<Longrightarrow>
  ?P \<parallel> ?R \<approx> ?Q \<parallel> ?R
  ?P \<approx> ?Q \<Longrightarrow> <\<nu>?x>?P \<approx> <\<nu>?x>?Q
  ?P \<approx> ?P
  eqvt weakBisim

this:
  P \<parallel>
  R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q \<parallel> R

lemma resPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   x :: name

  assumes PeqQ: "P \<simeq> Q"
  
  shows "<\<nu>x>P \<simeq> <\<nu>x>Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q x.
       P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       <\<nu>x>P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> <\<nu>x>Q

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q x.
       P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       <\<nu>x>P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> <\<nu>x>Q

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q x.
       P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       <\<nu>x>P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> <\<nu>x>Q

proof (state)
this:
  P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q x.
       P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       <\<nu>x>P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> <\<nu>x>Q

proof (chain)
picking this:
  eqvt weakBisim
  ?P \<approx> ?Q \<Longrightarrow> <\<nu>?x>?P \<approx> <\<nu>?x>?Q
  P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  eqvt weakBisim
  ?P \<approx> ?Q \<Longrightarrow> <\<nu>?x>?P \<approx> <\<nu>?x>?Q
  P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. <\<nu>x>P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> <\<nu>x>Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q
  ?P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> ?Q \<Longrightarrow>
  <\<nu>?x>?P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> <\<nu>?x>?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. <\<nu>x>P \<simeq> <\<nu>x>Q

lemma bangPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "!P \<simeq> !Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<simeq> !Q

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>R S.
       R \<simeq> S \<Longrightarrow>
       !R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> !S

proof (state)
this:
  P \<simeq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>R S.
       R \<simeq> S \<Longrightarrow>
       !R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> !S
let ?X = "{(P, Q) | P Q. P \<simeq> Q}"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>R S.
       R \<simeq> S \<Longrightarrow>
       !R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> !S

proof (state)
this:
  (P, Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>R S.
       R \<simeq> S \<Longrightarrow>
       !R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> !S

proof (state)
this:
  (P, Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>R S.
       R \<simeq> S \<Longrightarrow>
       !R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> !S

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       (P, Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q

proof (state)
this:
  (?P, ?Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
  ?P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> ?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>R S.
       R \<simeq> S \<Longrightarrow>
       !R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> !S

proof (state)
this:
  (?P, ?Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
  ?P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> ?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>R S.
       R \<simeq> S \<Longrightarrow>
       !R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> !S

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?P \<simeq> ?Q \<Longrightarrow> ?P \<approx> ?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q} \<subseteq> weakBisim

proof (state)
this:
  {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q} \<subseteq> weakBisim

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>R S.
       R \<simeq> S \<Longrightarrow>
       !R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> !S

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (P, Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q}
  (?P, ?Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
  ?P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> ?Q
  {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q} \<subseteq> weakBisim

proof (prove)
using this:
  (P, Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q}
  (?P, ?Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
  ?P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> ?Q
  {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q} \<subseteq> weakBisim

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>bangRel weakBisim\<guillemotright> !Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  (P, Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q}
  (?P, ?Q) \<in> {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q} \<Longrightarrow>
  ?P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> ?Q
  {(P, Q) |P Q. P \<simeq> Q} \<subseteq> weakBisim
  eqvt weakBisim

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>bangRel weakBisim\<guillemotright> !Q

proof (state)
this:
  !P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>bangRel weakBisim\<guillemotright> !Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>R S.
       R \<simeq> S \<Longrightarrow>
       !R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> !S

proof (state)
this:
  !P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>bangRel weakBisim\<guillemotright> !Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>R S.
       R \<simeq> S \<Longrightarrow>
       !R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> !S

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bangRel weakBisim \<subseteq> weakBisim

proof (state)
this:
  bangRel weakBisim \<subseteq> weakBisim

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>R S.
       R \<simeq> S \<Longrightarrow>
       !R \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> !S

proof (chain)
picking this:
  !P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>bangRel weakBisim\<guillemotright> !Q
  bangRel weakBisim \<subseteq> weakBisim

proof (prove)
using this:
  !P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>bangRel weakBisim\<guillemotright> !Q
  bangRel weakBisim \<subseteq> weakBisim

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> !Q
